name: video-translation-project
description: Sistema de tradução de vídeos do YouTube

scripts.install:backend: cd backend && (if exist venv\Scripts\pip.exe (venv\Scripts\pip.exe install -r requirements.txt) else (if exist venv\bin\pip (venv\bin\pip install -r requirements.txt) else (pip install -r requirements.txt)))
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
